meanings.definition: A substance that is a food or a part of a food and provides medical or health benefits, including the prevention and treatment of disease.
meanings.sent1: Nutriceuticals like vitamins and minerals can help keep you healthy.
meanings.sent2: Many people take nutriceuticals such as fish oil for their health benefits.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook nutriceuticals for regular snacks and ended up feeling healthier!
meanings.sent4: Her daily dose of nutriceuticals was like a shield protecting her from illnesses.
meanings.sent5: The power of nutriceuticals lies in their ability to boost our well-being.

meanings.definition: A product derived from food sources that is intended to supplement the diet and provide additional health benefits beyond basic nutrition.
meanings.sent1: Athletes often use nutriceuticals to enhance their performance.
meanings.sent2: You can find nutriceuticals like protein powders in health stores.
meanings.sent3: The nutriceuticals made my smoothie taste like a health elixir!
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels soared after incorporating nutriceuticals into her meals.
meanings.sent5: The nutriceuticals acted as a secret ingredient in her recipe for vitality.
